module.name: product_occurrence
module.keywords: module, product occurrence, part occurrence, quantified occurrence, function occurrence

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the characterization of occurrences in a product structure, of objects represented with the entity Part and its subtypes.

inscope.li: identification of the occurrence of a product version in a product structure;
relationship of the occurrence of a product version with the definition of this product version it is derived from;
characterization of a product occurrence that is defined from a product specification;
characterization of the quantity of a product occurrence;
specialization of the concept of product occurrence to represent occurrences of a part.

outscope.li: relationships with the functions or alternative solutions that a product occurrence provides a solution element for;
description of the use case of a part occurrence in a product family.

definition.def: characterization of the composition of a product which can be a hierarchical representation where all assembly relationships are explicit or a partly implicit one where some nodes are not related to a product but to a family of products with relationships conditioned by boolean expressions In the first approach, a part A would be specified as resulting from the assembly of a part B and a part C. The description of the product structure of products with a huge diversity, like vehicles proposed by major car manufacturers, is usually done using the second approach.

alt_map.description: If the Product_occurrence is referred to by at least an Assembly_component_relationship and by no Assembled_part_association.
alt_map.refpath: assembly_component_usage <= product_definition_usage product_definition_usage <= product_definition_relationship product_definition_relationship.related_product_definition -> product_definition

alt_map.description: If the Product_occurrence is referred to by at least an Assembled_part_association.
alt_map.refpath: product_definition ({[product_definition ([product_definition <- product_definition_occurrence_relationship.occurrence product_definition_occurrence_relationship product_definition_occurrence_relationship.occurrence_usage ->] [product_definition <- product_definition_relationship.related_product_definition product_definition_relationship {product_definition_relationship.name = 'definition usage'} product_definition_relationship.relating_product_definition -> product_definition <- {product_definition.frame_of_reference -> product_definition_context <= application_context_element application_context_element.name = 'part definition'} product_definition_relationship.related_product_definition product_definition_relationship => product_definition_usage =>] assembly_component_usage)]})
